name: SlitheringSnakeFacts
0:
”Alexa, open slither snake facts and tell me a fact”
”Alexa, open slither snake facts and tell me a snake fact”
”Alexa, open slither snake facts and give me snake trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: slither snake facts
des: Snakes are among the most extraordinary animals on the planet, and have managed to do so much even without limbs. This skill will help the mind explore and ponder with everything there is to know about snakes, their behavior, and amazing adaptations. You might even hear some interesting stories along the way. Prepare to delve deep into the world of snakes. What you find may surprise you!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
